affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
START RADIUS: 200
END RADIUS: 250
BURN DAMAGE: 16 / 35 / 56 / 76
MOVE AND ATTACK SLOW: 28% / 32% / 36% / 40%
DURATION: 5
cmb:
MANA COST: 135/140/155/170
COOLDOWN: 10
desc: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.
notes:
Can hit units up to 1000 range away.
Has a 0.3 second interval between each breath. Hits every 0.5 sec
lore: Pyrexae dragons have tremendously dangerous breath for each branch of the species; combining them is unimaginable.
name: jakiro_dual_breath

DURATION: 1 / 1.4 / 1.8 / 2.2
RADIUS: 150
DAMAGE: 50
cmb:
MANA COST: 90
COOLDOWN: 12/11/10/9
desc: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.
notes: It takes 0.5 seconds for the path to reach its full extent.
lore: Jakiro's cunning right head calls upon its frozen heritage, glazing the earth with blistering cold.
name: jakiro_ice_path

desc:
Jakiro lays down a line of flame in front of him, each dealing damage per second to enemy units in a wide area of effect.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: Macropyre destroys trees in its path.
lore: Ice and fire combine to rip the battlefield to shreds with extreme temperatures.
name: jakiro_macropyre
